title: Mirror Studio
prompt: Use the uploaded face image as the strict identity reference. Sleek studio with a tall oval mirror; subject in tailored suit touches the mirror, elegant posture. Shot on Canon R5 + RF 85mm f/1.2, top-lit softbox + negative fill, neutral background, cinematic contrast, clean color.

A wide shot of a modern conference room with large windows, showing a casually dressed man actively engaging in discussion at the table. Several colleagues sit around, some blurred, creating a sense of group interaction. Natural office lighting, cinematic tones. Captured on a Sony Alpha 7 IV with a 24-70mm f/2.8 lens at 35mm.
